description: Source file defining multiple Flutter widget screens for a TV-centric app, including navigation bars, detail view, search, watchlist, and settings screens, with focus and activation handling for D-pad navigation.

classes.name: TopNavBar
classes.description: A top navigation bar with tabs for TV in a D-pad navigable UI.

classes.name: _TopNavBarState
classes.description: State class managing focus nodes and building the navigation bar.

classes.name: _TvTabButton
classes.description: A button widget for each navigation tab, with focus and hover effects.

classes.name: _TvTabButtonState
classes.description: State class handling focus, hover, and activation for tab buttons.

classes.name: _TvIconButton
classes.description: A focusable icon button used in the navigation bar.

classes.name: _TvIconButtonState
classes.description: State class managing focus and pressed states for icon buttons.

classes.name: DetailsScreen
classes.description: A details display with focusable buttons for media actions and back navigation.

classes.name: _DetailsButtons
classes.description: Container widget for media action buttons within details screen.

classes.name: _DetailsButtonsState
classes.description: State class handling focus for the 'Play' and 'Add to Watchlist' buttons.

classes.name: SearchScreen
classes.description: A screen with a focusable search field and list of recent/search results.

classes.name: _SearchScreenState
classes.description: State class managing search query, results, and focus logic.

classes.name: WatchlistScreen
classes.description: A screen displaying a list of watchlisted items with focusable remove buttons.

classes.name: _WatchlistRow
classes.description: Focusable row widget for each watchlist item.

classes.name: _WatchlistRowState
classes.description: State class managing focus for the remove button of watchlist entries.

classes.name: SettingsScreen
classes.description: A focusable list of setting options with icons and descriptions.

classes.name: _SettingsTile
classes.description: A focusable list tile representing a setting option.

classes.name: _SettingsTileState
classes.description: State class handling focus effects for each setting tile.

classes.name: _FilledTvButton
classes.description: A focusable, animated filled button widget used throughout UI.

classes.name: _FilledTvButtonState
classes.description: State class managing hover, focus, pressed states for filled buttons.

classes.name: _OutlinedTvButton
classes.description: A focusable, animated outlined button widget used in the UI.

classes.name: _OutlinedTvButtonState
classes.description: State class managing focus, hover, pressed states for outlined buttons.

classes.name: _SearchFieldStub
classes.description: A focusable stub mimicking a search input, used for D-pad navigation.

classes.name: _SearchFieldStubState
classes.description: State class managing focus effects for the search field stub.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method in each widget class rendering the widget tree, with focus and gesture detection.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Dispose method in focusable widgets to free focus nodes.

methods.name: onActivate
methods.description: Callback invoked when a button or tab is activated via focus or click.

methods.name: setState
methods.description: Method called to update widget state on hover, focus, or press changes.
